body_text: shouldn't this be statusStyles or STATUS_STYLES? The capitalization of the first S suggests this is a class, which it isn't.
body: shouldn't this be `statusStyles` or `STATUS_STYLES`? The capitalization of the first `S` suggests this is a class, which it isn't.
body_html: shouldn't this be statusStyles or STATUS_STYLES? The capitalization of the first S suggests this is a class, which it isn't.
